title: A California Republican faces long odds after redistricting. Will he seek a safer seat in Texas?
description: In heavily Democratic California, one prominent Republican U.S. House member is considering an audacious maneuver — moving to Texas to run for Congress
content: LOS ANGELES -- The redrawing of Californias congressional map to boost Democrats' chances has left Republicans scrambling for political survival. Some are digging in for tough races, but one is consi… [+3690 chars]
